summary: A tragicomic story about rural extinction and the meeting between the local shoemaker Gustafsson and Pettersson from Stockholm.
cast: Allan Edwall|Bellan Roos|Gus Dahlström|Gunnar Strååt|Janne Carlsson|Christina Stenius|Gunilla Larsson|Lars Hansson|Lottie Ejebrant|Olle Andersson|Ing-Margret Lackne|Bo Samuelsson
director: Director: Lars Lennart Forsberg (as Lasse Forsberg)
title: Vem älskar Yngve Frej
